alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 31 at 5:38PM MST until August 31 at 6:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gila County in east central Arizona... Coconino County in north central Arizona... * Until 630 PM MST. * At 537 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mesa Del Caba, or over Payson, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Payson, Star Valley, Flowing Springs, Beaver Valley Estates, Mesa Del Caballo, Water Wheel Falls, Geronimo Estates, Ellison Creek Cascades, Freedom Acres, East Verde Estates, Washington Park, Whispering Pines, Mead Ranch, Mesa Del Caba, Baker Butte Lookout, Payson Airport, Knoll Lake, Geronimo Boy Scout Camp, and Houston Mesa Campground. This includes the following highways... State Route 260 between mile markers 252 and 259. State Route 87 southbound near mile marker 251. State Route 87 between mile markers 251 and 261, and between mile markers 281 and 284. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
